greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of edges in a figure made up of a row of n adjacent congruent rectangles upon drawing diagonals of all possible rectangles.
link: Lars Blomberg, Scott R. Shannon, N. J. A. Sloane, Graphical Enumeration and Stained Glass Windows, 1: Rectangular Grids, (2020). Also arXiv:2009.07918.
mathematica: Table[n^2 + 4n + 1 + Sum[Sum[(2 * Boole[GCD[i, j] == 1] - Boole[GCD[i, j] == 2]) * (n + 1 - i) * (n + 1 - j), {j, 1, n}], {i, 1, n}], {n, 1, 37}] (* _Joshua Oliver_, Feb 05 2020 *)
xref: A306302 gives number of regions in the figure.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 04 2020
